body.p: This document tests handling of revision flagging (@rev) and @status flagging.
In particular, it tests formatting of entire topics marked as changed or revised. It also tests the flagging associated with @status values.

This document uses the @platform attribute as a filtering attribute to filter on the specific DITAVAL file used. Each DITAVAL used for testing sets default for @platform to "exclude" and then includes the value for itself. This allows the test document to reflect which DITAVAL file was used to produce it.
